channel.title: Download hosting
channel.description:
Hi everyone, I have developed a website (Download Mania) So that you can post your download (any) and download other peoples. It is TOTALY FREE and there is no wait time. What to do.... Go to: [url=http://www.downloadmania.110mb.com/index.php]DM's Home page]www.downloadmania.110mb.com/index.php]DM's Home page[/url] Sign up, post your download in the right section. You can post a link to, for eg: Rapidshare or upload your program to your post. That is done by pushing Additional Options...
When uploaded, You may upload more, Or browse at what different people have posted. We Need mods and We need admins. please Help a guy try to make a download website/forum. I have just got it up and running, We are in the process of getting a Domain (downloadmania.org):P
Btw, Does anyone have the link to pvpscape? Thanks

um, go to www.dotworlds.com, you can make your own IDIOT

item.title: Download hosting
item.dc:creator: @jonesd jonesd
item.description:
@jonesd wrote:

tyvm.
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2007, 04:31:24 AM[/size][hr]I need a team of upto 10 mods and 5 admins! You will recive your own email address (you@downloadmania.d4u)
d4u stands for downloads 4 u.
the domain will be:
downloadmania.org or
downloadmania.d4u
Thanks
I forgot to say, thats when i register the domain in about 3 weeks :P:)[br][size=1]Posted on: February 08, 2007, 04:34:52 AM[/size][hr]? anyone gonna do this offer

Read full topic
